live_deals.title: Happy Hour
live_deals.description: Time: 3 PM - 6 PM | Days: Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday
live_deals.source_text: JOIN US FOR HAPPY HOUR! Available Daily 3-6 PM  & Thurs-Sat 9PM-Close *Excludes some holidays and event days Meeting up with friends after work for drinks is what it’s all about! Join us for Happy Hour every day from 3-6 pm & Thurs -Sat from 9 pm-Close! Make your  today! HAPPY HOUR MENU *Prices vary at the Denver, CO location HAPPY HOUR COCKTAILS $ 9.95 MOSCOW MULE New Amsterdam Vodka, ginger beer, lime juice, simple syrup and a wedge lime. $ 9.95 $ 9.95 THIRSTY LION MARGARITA Sauza Hacienda Teq
